body.name: Linenspa 8 Inch Memory Foam and Spring Hybrid Mattress - Medium Firm Feel - Bed in a Box - Quality Comfort and Adaptive Support - Breathable - Cooling - Guest and Kids Bedroom - Twin Size
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 47 mins
features: SIMPLE SETUP AND QUICK EXPANSION: Mattress is compressed, rolled, and sent in a box, open your mattress promptly upon receiving it and allow 24 to 72 hours for full expansion; memory foam mattress may expand more quickly in a warm room

RESPONSIVE HYBRID DESIGN: Get the best of both worlds, just like Hannah Montana, when the contouring comfort of memory foam and the durable support of springs combine in our most popular mattress ever

UNBEATABLE VALUE: Comfort meets value when it comes to this affordable memory foam hybrid mattress, it’s available in three different profiles and feels to accommodate sleepers of all styles and all sizes

MEDIUM FIRM FEEL:This mattress combines multiple support and comfort layers to bring you responsive comfort and a medium-firm feel great for back, and stomach sleepers and is ideal for kids rooms, a guest bed, bunk beds, trundle beds, or as an RV mattress
WORRY-FREE WARRANTY: Linenspa mattresses include a limited 10-year warranty, this innerspring and memory foam hybrid mattress is so much more than just a bed in box — it’s the complete package
body.description: Bring home the pressure relief of a memory foam mattress with the reliable support of a traditional innerspring mattress. This 8-inch mattress combines the best of both worlds to bring you revolutionary comfort in one affordable hybrid mattress. For those who prefer a medium-firm mattress, you’ve found your match. Durable steel coils evenly distribute weight and cushioning memory foam minimizes pressure and conforms to your body. The responsive design and durable materials of this mattress make it ideal for any bedroom. And if you’re looking for a mattress for kids, bunk beds, trundles, guest rooms, and more, the versatile 8-inch profile is just the right size. Plus, this mattress in a box arrives directly to your door, making it the complete sleep package, literally. When it arrives, simply unbox and unroll your new mattress to start sleeping better.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Finding the right mattress just got easier. Get the 8-inch mattress for your kid’s bunk bed, the 10-inch mattress for your guest room, and the 12-inch mattress for yourself. It’s not too soft and it’s not too firm. Sleep on your side, back, or stomach. No matter how you sleep, your body stays supported. The hardest part of buying a new mattress is figuring out how to get it home. This trusted and affordable mattress comes to you. Nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it so much, I bought a 2nd one (I think you have to pay xtra for bugs)
reviews.reviewText: I now have two of these in my home for my two children... I bought my first in September of 2018 to replace an old mattress for my daughter... it was great, and my daughter loved the mattress... no issues at all with the mattress... my son needed a new mattress too, so I was about to order a 2nd one in February 2019 when I noticed numerous reviews (many recent) citing reports of bedbugs.Now let me clarify my experience here... I work in the hospitality business and maintain dormitories for military training students that are on a constant rotation, much like a hotel. We are all trained to spot, look for and deal with bed bugs should ever the problem arise... bed bugs have nothing to do with personal hygene or cleanliness, they can infest anything from the sleaziest no-tell motel to the fanciest 5-star Hyatt Regency. Also, bed bugs don't limit themselves to beds, they will travel and hide on/in anything... clothes, shoes, carpets, suitcases, curtains, laptops, alarm clocks, a book... bed bugs aren't picky. For those reviewers that say they got bedbugs... if you think it came from the mattress and you just tossed it out, problem solved... YOU STILL HAVE BEDBUGS because your house is now infested (or previously was and you just now noticed).Now back to these Linenspa mattresses... I LOVE THESE THINGS... they're very comfortable and affordable... both my kids love them. I had already purchased one back in 2018 and never had any issues, and as someone who can spot those little devils, our house is free of them. When I ordered my 2nd mattress (after reading the negative bug reviews) I went ahead and took the added precaution... and you should too... if you're ever worried about something like this...INSPECT AND OPEN THE MATTRESS OUTSIDE YOUR HOUSE!I just laid a bedsheet in the driveway, opened the box, inspected the vacuum-sealed wrap... saw nothing... opened it up on the sheet on my driveway (to keep it clean of course) and fully inspected this sucker everywhere... nope... no bugs, no smells... just a nice clean beautiful mattress. Carried it inside, no issues, son happy... If you actually do have one that is infested like some people claim, and you opened it inside and slept on it... ya... your whole house is now infested (and possibly was before you bought a new mattress).I just want to make it clear that as someone who works in the hospitality business and is trained in spotting and dealing with those little devils long before it becomes a problem... I've bought two of these mattresses from this company and never had an issue with bugs or smells... and if I need a third or fourth mattress, i would buy another... but if you ever suspect or worry about something like this from this company, or ANY company... just open it outside on a clean sheet and inspect thoroughly before you bring it in.... that way if there is a problem, you don't risk letting them into your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price and has lasted a long time and still comfortable
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this mattress for my daughter when we upgraded her bed frame. Financially speaking, it's a smart investment. The quality and durability of this mattress at such an accessible price point truly impressed us. It's reassuring to know we've provided our child with a high-quality sleep solution without breaking the bank, which is a big consideration for our large family. Comfort and support were non-negotiable. This mattress delivers on both fronts remarkably well and has lasted 3 years without any wearing down. The memory foam adapts to our daughter's body while the spring base provides the necessary support, ensuring a good night's sleep without compromising on comfort. The mattress is lightweight and was easy for me to move and open on my own. After seeing the quality and durability with our own eyes, we purchased another one for one of our other daughters. Overall we are very pleased with our purchase and would recommend this mattress to fellow parents without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Labor free and light weight. The mattress was immediately placed on the frame and waited a few days to try it out. This is a good value and is very comfortable for a guest bedroom. I’m please with the purchase although I don’t have to sleep on it. I think it’s going to work wonderfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed my review
reviews.reviewText: Updated review:Although I wasn't going to order the same mattress, I couldn't decided what I wanted, and I didn't want to pay a lot of money for a mattress that wouldn't be used often. So, I caved and bought the same one again. This time it was 7" upon opening, and is already almost expanded to 8". I do not know why my other mattress didn't expand, but I am pleased with this one. It really is a nice mattress for a guest bed. It is comfortable. It also was delivered very fast. I wasn't expecting it for a few more days.The mattress was for a guest bedroom. Initially I loved it. It was used about a week out of the month. It never expanded to 8". It was initially very comfortable, but thin and very springy. Overall, it held up well. This time I am going to invest in a quality mattress. I do recommend this mattress for a guest bedroom that is not used often. It is far from the worst.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a toddler bed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Linenspa 8 Inch Memory Foam and Spring Hybrid Mattress for my toddler's bed, and I have to say, I am extremely pleased with my choice. As a parent, finding the right mattress for my child's comfort and support is of utmost importance, and this mattress has truly delivered.First and foremost, I was impressed with the quality and durability of the mattress. It is well-made and designed to withstand the wear and tear that comes with a child's bed. The hybrid construction, combining memory foam and springs, provides an ideal balance of comfort and support for my little one.The 8-inch thickness is perfect for a toddler bed. It offers a comfortable and plush surface without sacrificing the necessary support for growing bodies. It provides just the right amount of firmness to promote healthy spinal alignment and ensure a restful sleep for my child.One of the features I appreciate the most is the mattress's ability to isolate motion. This is particularly important when your child is transitioning from a crib to a toddler bed. It minimizes any disruptions caused by their movements, allowing for a more peaceful and uninterrupted sleep for both my child and me.Additionally, the mattress is hypoallergenic and made with safe materials, which gives me peace of mind. It is CertiPUR-US certified, ensuring that it is free from harmful chemicals and substances. This is especially important for children with sensitivities or allergies.Overall, I highly recommend the Linenspa 8 Inch Memory Foam and Spring Hybrid Mattress for toddler beds. Its quality, comfort, and safety features make it an excellent choice for providing a comfortable and restful sleep environment for your little one

reviews.reviewTitle: So far so good. Certainly not a high end mattress but comfortable enough and great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: As other reviews have said, this is a surprisingly good quality mattress. Can't beat the simplicity of ordering on Amazon and getting it in a day or two in a easy to move box. Setup was easy enough and the smell was not bad at all and didn't last very long.Mattress looks good and is fairly comfortable. I prefer firmer mattresses and this is certainly on the softer side but it still provided a good night's sleep. It does feel a bit cheaper because it is lighter weight and a bit more giving and soft. For the price it is more than adequate but don't expect a high end feel with this mattress. I wouldn't recommend it for two heavier adults as a daily long term bed, as it seems like it might settle or sink more than higher end mattresses - but maybe it won't.We have been using this mattress for several months now and it is holding up really well.For a guest bedroom or for smaller individuals this is a great mattress for the price. Will it last for another 10 years, time will tell but even if not the convenience, price and comfort make it a winner so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super colchon a un super precio
reviews.reviewText: La verdad, buscar un colchón nuevo nunca me ha gustado. Es mucho de ir a tiendas físicas y lidiar con vendedores que pueden llegar a ser molestos ya que siempre quieren vender lo más caro, y la. Verdad, sus colchones del rango de 4000-6000 dejan mucho que desear luego.Decidí intentar algo nuevo y comprar un colchón de los que vienen enrollados y enviados en cajas para variar.La verdad es que hace años que he querido comprar uno como los Luuna o otras marcas que ya tienen presencia en México, pero sus colchones individuales están en 7000 o más y uno Queen ni se diga.Ya usando Amazon por un par de años, busque colchones de memory foam y encontré esta marca de LinenSpa la cual nunca había escuchado, pero después de investigar en línea y ver varias reseñas tanto en vídeos como escritos, decidí comprarlo.Este es un colchón híbrido de memory foam y resortes clásicos y aunque si tuve dudas, estas desaparecieron después de haberlo usado.El colchón llega enrollado y en una caja, y es cuestión de solo sacarlo y acomodar lo de tal manera que cuando se desenrolle quede como se deba.Debo de advertirles que tengan sumo cuidado cuando vayan a romper la cinta con la cual esta asegurado el colchón antes de desenrollarlo. Yo estaba cortando la cinta con un cuchillo, pero el colchón, al tener resortes, llegó un punto que la cinta que estaba cortando no aguanto tanta presión de los resortes y reventó lo que faltaba y el colchón impacto contra mi mano que tenía el cuchillo a gran velocidad y por suerte no pasó nada, pero algo pude haber salido mal así que les imploro que no usen cuchillos y traten de quitar la cinta a mano (o a lo mucho con unas llaves o algo sin filo extremo).Una vez desenrollado y y haberlo dejado por más de 10 horas, el colchón estaba en su apogeo y estaba listo para usarse.Ahora, nunca he usado un colchón de puro memory foam, pero déjenme decirles que este híbrido se siente increíble, ya que los resortes ofrecen excelente soporte pero el memory foam ayuda a que no se llegue a sentir ni un solo resorte en el cuerpo y solo se sienta un superficie suave y fresca.Por el precio, esto es un Super colchón y vale la pena la inversión aunque seas un estudiante y apenas vas a comprar tu primer colchón.

reviews.reviewTitle: it's good but a bit too soft
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is thick and comfortable in general. However, if the weight is up to certain level, it could be too soft to the people.
It was great but starting to hurt my hip a bit.

Este colchón es fantástico. Lo compré hace ya más de dos meses, por lo que esperé para escribir esta reseña cuando realmente pudiese opinar sobre el producto. Primero que nada, ¡viene en una caja! Es super fácil de transportar, yo lo subí sola dos pisos por escaleras sin problemas, mido 1.60, mujer, 32 años y soy de contextura normal tendiendo a rellenita.¡Es muy divertido abrirlo y ver cómo va tomando forma! Es firme, sin ser una piedra, pero lo que más me gusta es que mantiene su forma. Constantemente me siento sobre una esquina del colchón para ver la televisión y me preocupaba mucho que se deformara, pero se mantiene intacto hasta ahora.Siempre he sido de dormir boca abajo, pero con este colchón, por alguna razón, se me antoja y se me hace comodísimo dormir boca arriba o de lado y me despierto super relajada al despertar. Lo compré porque estaba durmiendo en una especie de sofá que francamente me estaba destruyendo la espalda y tenía un dolor espantoso en la espalda baja y no me sentía descansada para nada.Llevo dos meses durmiendo en este colchón y no solo ya no me duele la espalda, sino que me despierto descansada y con energía. Leí no sé cuantas reseñas de colchones tanto en inglés como en español y de verdad que no crean las que son negativas. Este es el mejor colchón en caja ( y el de mejor precio ) que pueden conseguir.Me arrepiento de no haber comprado el tamaño Queen. Mi perrita, que tiene su propia cama, ¡ya no quiere dormir más en su cama sino conmigo y ahora se viene al colchón a dormir la siesta! Estoy ahorrando para comprarme las almohadas de esta misma marca y más adelante este mismo colchón pero en tamaño Queen y el topper.Pienso que si no te gustan los colchones firmes, puede que este no sea el colchón para ti. Quizás una persona con considerable sobrepeso pueda llegar a sentir los resortes, pero como puse al principio yo soy de contextura normal, más bien rellena y no peso poco (¡jamás diré cuánto peso!) y yo no siento absolutamente nada más que extrema comodidad.Había leído también que muchas personas lo estaban comprando para niños, por lo que me preocupaba que no fuese a ser ideal para una persona adulta, pero nada que ver.Estoy encantada y se lo recomendaré a todo el mundo.
